answer:
We do not provide travel vaccine recommendations at ImmunizeBC.  We recommend that you contact your local travel clinic for this information.  You can find a list of travel clinics in BC here. For more information on travel vaccines, visit our travel vaccinations page.
Immunization Nurse
question: Hello my wife and I are travelling to Cabo San Lucas Mexico for 10 Days. and would like to know what you recommend for immunizations. I have a cystic Fibrosis lung disease.
